Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Manages the GUI and view updates for the Tetris game. Handles rendering of the game board, bricks, ghost pieces, animations, and UI panels. Coordinates between the game logic and JavaFX UI components.

      brick - The initial brick view data

      public void bindLines(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty integerProperty, SoundController soundController)
      Binds the lines label to a lines property and updates level based on lines cleared.
      Parameters:
      integerProperty - The lines property to bind
      soundController - The sound controller for level-up sounds

    • configureTimeAttackMode

      public void configureTimeAttackMode(int initialTime, int targetScore)
      Configures the UI for Time Attack mode. Updates labels to show time and target score instead of level and lines.
      Parameters:
      initialTime - Initial time remaining in seconds
      targetScore - Target score to achieve

    • updateTimer

      public void updateTimer(int seconds)
      Updates the timer display for Time Attack mode.
      Parameters:
      seconds - The number of seconds remaining

    • configurePuzzleMode

      public void configurePuzzleMode(int lineGoal)
      Configures the UI for Puzzle mode. Updates labels to show lines cleared and goal.
      Parameters:
      lineGoal - The target number of lines to clear
